thread.title: Warm welcome and great value - Review
thread.title_full: Warm welcome and great value - Review of Lenox Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lynnnells
title: Warm welcome and great value - Review
text: Well situated especially for some TGV lines. Great value with a generous and varied breakfast. Courteous, helpful staff. Room spotless although a little repainting would be advisable. Tea and coffee making in room great and complimentary coffee in well stocked honesty bar a bonus.
